content: आप्लुत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Bathed; अवभृथाप्लुतो मुनिः <ls>R. 11. 31</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 5.</ls> {@--2@} Wetted, sprinkled; <ls>R. 17. 37.</ls> {@--3@} Overflowing with, filled or overcome with; बाष्प, °व्यसन°, रुधिर° &c. --तः , °व्रती An initiated house-holder, see आप्लवव्रतिन्. --तं Bathing.
